SELECT
, u.user_name AS "createName" FROM project t LEFT JOIN project_team pt ON t.id = pt.project_id LEFT JOIN user u ON t.create_by = u.id WHERE pt.team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY t.create_date

select count(distinct u.id) from project p left join project_team pt on p.id = pt.project_id left join user_team ut on ut.team_id = pt.team_id left join user u on ut.user_id = u.id where p.id = #{projectId} order by ut.create_date
select t.team_name from team t left join project_team pt on t.id = pt.team_id where pt.project_id = #{projectId} order by pt.create_date

select (select count(t.id) from task t where t.task_status = 'new' and t.project_id = #{projectId}) as "newTaskCnt" ,(select count(t.id) from task t where t.task_status = 'todo' and t.project_id = #{projectId}) as "todoTaskCnt" ,(select count(t.id) from task t where t.task_status = 'done' and t.project_id = #{projectId}) as "doneTaskCnt" ,(select count(t.id) from task t where t.task_status = 'close' and t.project_id = #{projectId}) as "closeTaskCnt" ,(select count(t.id) from task t where YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(NOW()) and t.project_id = #{projectId}) as "addTaskCnt"

select u.user_name from project p left join project_team pt on p.id = pt.project_id left join user_team ut on ut.team_id = pt.team_id left join user u on ut.user_id = u.id where p.id = #{projectId} order by ut.create_date
